weka.clusterers

Class DBACluster.AntHill.Clusters

  • java.lang.Object
    • weka.clusterers.DBACluster.AntHill.Clusters
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Iterable<DBACluster.AntHill.Cluster>
    Enclosing class:
    DBACluster.AntHill

    protected class DBACluster.AntHill.Clusters
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Iterable<DBACluster.AntHill.Cluster>
    Management class for DBACluster.AntHill.Clusters. It provides a more comfortable way to address and manage Cluster objects.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      protected class  DBACluster.AntHill.Clusters.ClusterNumGenerator
      The task of the ClusterNumGenerator is to provide ID numbers for new clusters, so that each cluster has an unique ID.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      protected DBACluster.AntHill.Clusters.ClusterNumGenerator clusterNumGenerator
      The ClusterNumGenerator object of this Clusters instance.
      protected java.util.ArrayList<DBACluster.AntHill.Cluster> clusters
      List of available DBACluster.AntHill.Cluster objects.
      protected DBACluster.AntHill.Cluster noiseCluster
      A link to the noise cluster, that is a special cluster holding the instances regarded as noise.
